casebody.head_matter:
Glickstein et al., Appellants, v. County Board of Elections.
Argued April 30, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Robert Baer Cohen, with him William Austin Meehan, and Abrahams <& Loewenstein, for appellants.
Harry Wolov, for appellee.
May 3, 1974:
